alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Miller (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 4:09PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Decatur, southeastern Miller, southwestern Mitchell and southwestern Baker Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 408 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near West Bainbridge, or near Bainbridge, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bainbridge, Boykin, Hanover, Ausmac, Babcock, Eldorendo, Decatur Co A/P, Steinham Store and Bellview. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
